results.title: Black Hills National Cemetery Boundary Expansion Act
results.short_title: Black Hills National Cemetery Boundary Expansion Act
results.committees: Senate Energy and Natural Resources Committee
results.latest_major_action: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 49.
results.summary: Black Hills National Cemetery Boundary Expansion Act  This bill transfers jurisdiction over certain public land from the Department of the Interior to the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) for inclusion in the Black Hills National Cemetery.
results.summary_short: Black Hills National Cemetery Boundary Expansion Act  This bill transfers jurisdiction over certain public land from the Department of the Interior to the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) for inclusion in the Black Hills National Cemetery.

actions.description: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 49.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported by Senator Murkowski with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. With written report No. 115-35.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
